thread.title: News24.com | TUT's Pretoria campus suspends classes after protests
thread.title_full: News24.com | TUT's Pretoria campus suspends classes after protests

title: News24.com | TUT's Pretoria campus suspends classes after protests
text:
. 
University spokesperson, Willa de Ruyter, said management took a decision to suspend classes for the safety of the staff and the students. 
“There was protest action that erupted during the night and there were fires set alight on campus, and after assessing the situation, the vice chancellor informed the community that the campus will be closed for today.” 
She encouraged everyone to visit the university’s website www.tut.ac.za for the latest updates. Another day another strike.This time
